SEARCH
Package cookbook.controller

Interface RecipeDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
RecipeDaoImpl
public interface RecipeDao
RecipeDao is an interface that defines the CRUD operations for managing recipes and their related entities in the cookbook application.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • createRecipe

      void createRecipe(Recipe recipe, int userId)
      Creates a new recipe in the database.
      Parameters:
      recipe - the Recipe object containing the recipe data.
      userId - the ID of the user who creates the recipe.

    • getAllCommonRecipes

      List<Recipe> getAllCommonRecipes(int userId)
      Retrieves all common recipes visible to a specific user from the database.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user for whom to retrieve the common recipes.
      Returns:
      a list of Recipe objects visible to the specified user.

    • getRecipeById

      Recipe getRecipeById(int id, int userId)
      Retrieves a recipe from the database by its ID and user ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the recipe.
      userId - the ID of the user to whom the recipe belongs.
      Returns:
      the Recipe object corresponding to the specified ID and user ID.

    • updatePersonalTags

      void updatePersonalTags(Recipe recipe, int userId)
      Updates the personal tags for a user on a recipe.
      Parameters:
      recipe - the Recipe object to be updated
      userId - the User whos tags should be updated

    • updateRecipe

      void updateRecipe(Recipe recipe)
      Updates an existing recipe in the database.
      Parameters:
      recipe - the Recipe object containing the updated recipe data.

    • deleteRecipe

      void deleteRecipe(int id)
      Deletes a recipe from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the recipe to delete.

    • search

      Map<EnumSearch,List<Recipe>> search(List<SearchBy> opts, String search, int userId)
      Searches for recipes based on various search options.
      Parameters:
      opts - the list of SearchBy options.
      search - the search string containing keywords.
      userId - the ID of the user performing the search.
      Returns:
      a map with EnumSearch as keys and lists of Recipe objects as values.

    • doFavourite

      void doFavourite(int recipeId, int userId, boolean isFavourite)
      Marks or unmarks a recipe as favourite for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      recipeId - the ID of the recipe.
      userId - the ID of the user.
      isFavourite - if true, marks the recipe as favourite; if false, unmarks it.

    • loadIngredients

      void loadIngredients(Recipe recipe)
      Loads the ingredients of a recipe from the database.
      Parameters:
      recipe - the Recipe object to load the ingredients into.

    • loadSteps

      void loadSteps(Recipe recipe)
      Loads the steps of a recipe from the database.
      Parameters:
      recipe - the Recipe object to load the steps into.

    • getFavourites

      List<Recipe> getFavourites(int userId)
      Retrieves all favourite recipes of a specific user from the database.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user for whom to retrieve the favourite recipes.
      Returns:
      a list of Recipe objects marked as favourites by the specified user.

    • convertRecipeTo

      Recipe convertRecipeTo(int portions, Recipe recipe)
      Converts a recipe to a specified number of portions.
      Parameters:
      portions - the number of portions to convert the recipe to.
      recipe - the Recipe object to convert.
      Returns:
      the converted Recipe object.

    • getAllTags

      List<Tag> getAllTags(int userId)
      Retrieves all tags visible to a specific user from the database.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user for whom to retrieve the tags.
      Returns:
      a list of Tag objects visible to the specified user.

    • getOwnedTags

      List<Tag> getOwnedTags(int userId)
      Retrieves all tags owned by a specific user from the database.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user who owns the tags.
      Returns:
      a list of Tag objects owned by the specified user.

    • getBaseTags

      List<Tag> getBaseTags()
      Retrieves all base tags from the database (tags that are not user-specific).
      Returns:
      a list of base Tag objects.

    • loadTags

      void loadTags(Recipe recipe, int userId)
      Loads the tags of a recipe from the database.
      Parameters:
      recipe - the Recipe object to load the tags into.
      userId - the ID of the user to whom the recipe belongs.

    • addTagToRecipe

      void addTagToRecipe(int recipeId, int tagId, int userId)
      Adds a tag to a recipe for a specific user in the database.
      Parameters:
      recipeId - the ID of the recipe.
      tagId - the ID of the tag.
      userId - the ID of the user adding the tag.
